text: A S'more is a snack food eaten during camping trips, because you can put the marshmallow on a stick and cook it over a campfire. They are made using a graham cracker, chocolate, and a marshmallow. S'mores can have around 268 calories, but it can change if you use different kinds of chocolate, marshmallows, or graham crackers. August 10 is National S'more Day. == References == Category:Desserts Category:Snack foods Category:Chocolate
title: S'more
